column5: Quality accommodation for travelers wanting home comforts at an affordable price. Located in booming South Lamar, this 2000sf condo features contemporary and mid-century interiors, comfy bedding, city views, secure off-street parking and easy bus access. There are lots of trendy restaurants, bars, boutiques and more within walking distance. We hope you'll give us a try!
column8: Modern Townhome, Heart of SoLa, Room B
